description: The Space enables you to add source code to a project and organize them as files, edit the code, and preview their output. For example, you can select New File , add your .HTML , .CSS , .JS , etc. code, edit the code, and select Render to preview the code's output.

As you work in The Space, you can save the configuration of your workspace as a THESPACE file by selecting Export Project . After selecting this option, The Space downloads a settings.thespace file you can keep on your computer to preserve your settings.

common_filenames.description: settings.thespace - The default filename given to a THESPACE file downloaded from a web browser when a user saves settings in Bluspace The Space.
